original_title: Xena XXX: An Exquisite Films Parody
overview: Xena and Gabrielle are on a journey to help a friend in need in the adult feature Xena XXX. They find their long time friend and confidant, Hercules, who is on his own journey. Together they face both mortals and dogs from their past, some are friend and some are foe. Whether they are on or off their battlefield, devouring their enemies, or devouring each other, the encounters are always intense and epic. When the dust settles and the action appears to be over, Xena and Gabrielle have their long awaited intimate time together that brings the excitement up to a whole new level!
tagline: An erotic twist on the long-running TV series
title: Xena XXX: An Exquisite Films Parody
